pages.title: Angelic Stiffness
pages.text: Angelic Stiffness Rids You From All Fall Damage And Provides A Luck Boost. Though, You Are Slower.

pages.title: Applying Angelic Stiffness
pages.text: You Can Apply Angelic Stiffness By Right-Clicking A Totem Of Salvation With An Angelic Soul Shard In Your Offhand.
